casebody.data:
EHMANN, et al.
v.
MEDFLOW, INC., et al. 433A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 13, 2018 Matthew N. Leerberg, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, C. Bailey King, Jr., Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Medflow, Inc., et al. Harold C. Spears, Christopher P. Raab, Attorneys at Law, Charlotte, for Ehmann, Eugene K., et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 13th of July 2018 by Plaintiffs:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of July 2018."
